column1: Monthly Social Security benefits are payable from the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance (OASI) Trust Fund and the Disability Insurance (DI) Trust Funds. Such benefits are paid to several  types of beneficiaries.  Supplemental Security Income (SSI) benefits are paid from the general fund of the Treasury.

Social Security beneficiary data in table format  Number of Social Security  beneficiaries at end of calendar years  Annual benefits paid from the trust funds by type of beneficiary:  OASI benefit amounts  DI benefit amounts  Other statistical tables
How benefits are computed  Retirement  benefit examples  Benefit formula
